name: Next.js App Router Best Practices
description: Next.js 14+ with App Router and Server Components
rules: Use App Router (app/) directory structure, not Pages Router
Server Components by default, only use 'use client' when necessary
Implement proper loading.tsx and error.tsx for each route
Use Next.js Image component for all images with proper sizing
Fetch data in Server Components using async/await, not useEffect
Use Server Actions for form submissions and mutations
Implement proper metadata exports for SEO in every page
Use route groups () for layout organization without URL changes
Leverage parallel routes and intercepting routes for advanced UX
Always validate environment variables with Zod or similar
